SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.networking

Interface VirtualView

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
Client, ClientRmi, ClientSocket
public interface VirtualView extends Remote
The VirtualView interface defines the methods that must be implemented by any class that acts as a view in the Model-View-Controller (MVC) pattern over a network. It extends the Remote interface.

  • Method Details

    • getOnline

      boolean getOnline() throws RemoteException
      Checks if the client is online.
      Returns:
      true if the client is online, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.

    • getNickname

      String getNickname() throws RemoteException
      Retrieves the nickname of the client.
      Returns:
      the client's nickname.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.

    • getPing

      boolean getPing() throws RemoteException
      Checks if the client is responsive.
      Returns:
      true if the client is responsive, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.

    • getStarter

      boolean getStarter() throws RemoteException
      Checks if the client is the starter of the game.
      Returns:
      true if the client finished its phase of choosing starter card and achievements, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.

    • getNicknameFirst

      String getNicknameFirst() throws RemoteException
      Retrieves the nickname of the first client.
      Returns:
      the nickname of the first client.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.

    • setOnline

      void setOnline(boolean b) throws RemoteException
      Sets the online status of the client.
      Parameters:
      b - true to set the client online, false to set the client offline.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.

    • setNickname

      void setNickname(String nick) throws RemoteException
      Sets the nickname of the client.
      Parameters:
      nick - the nickname to set for the client.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.

    • setPing

      void setPing(boolean b) throws RemoteException
      Sets the ping status of the client.
      Parameters:
      b - true to set the client as responsive, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.

    • setStarter

      void setStarter(boolean b) throws RemoteException
      Sets the starter status of the client.
      Parameters:
      b - true if the client finished its phase of choosing starter card and achievements, false otherwise.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a remote communication error occurs.

    • showAction

      void showAction(Action act) throws IOException
      Displays an action to the client.
      Parameters:
      act - the action to display.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during communication.
